original_text: And Moses wrote all the words of the Lord, and rose up early in the morning, and builded an altar under the hill, and twelve pillars, according to the twelve tribes of Israel.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와의 모든 말씀을 기록하고 이른 아침에 일어나 산 아래에 제단을 쌓고 이스라엘 열두 지파대로 열두 기둥을 세우고

sentences.original_text: And Moses wrote all the words of the Lord
and rose up early in the morning
and builded an altar under the hill
according to the twelve tribes of Israel
